name: CSCardTransition
summary: CSCardTransition allows you to create wonderful transition animations like in the App Store.
description:
Smooth Transition from any UIView expanding into a UIViewController. Swift coded iOS Library. 
The animation looks like the App Store Card Animation. The library uses your custom UINavigationController (Navigation Controller) to push and pop with the transition.
It also implements a smooth and nice custom drag gesture to pop out the Card View Controller with haptic feedback.
